entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sanirajak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:45 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, -37.9°C

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 40 this afternoon.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then light late this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 40 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 44 this morning and minus 55 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 41.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 41. Wind chill minus 54 this evening and minus 49 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023
